io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.logic.api.usecase

Interface UcFindOffer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Offermanagement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OffermanagementImpl, UcFindOfferImpl

    public interface UcFindOffer
    Interface for the usecsae to find offers.
    Author:
    mvielsac

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<OfferEto> findAllOffers()

      Gets an OfferEto using its entity identifier.

    • Method Detail

      • findOffer

        OfferEto findOffer(Long id)
        Gets an OfferEto using its entity identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - is the offer ID.
        Returns:
        the requested Offer or null if no such Offer exists.

      • findOfferCto

        OfferCto findOfferCto(Long id)
        Gets an OfferCto using its entity identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - is the offer ID.
        Returns:
        the requested Offer or null if no such Offer exists.

      • findAllOffers

        List<OfferEto> findAllOffers()
        Returns:
        the List with all available OfferEtos.

      • isProductInUseByOffer

        boolean isProductInUseByOffer(ProductEto product)
        Checks, whether a given ProductEto is in use by at least one OfferEto.
        Parameters:
        product - product to check if it is in use
        Returns:
        true, if there are no offers, that use the given ProductEto. false otherwise.

      • findOffersFiltered

        List<OfferEto> findOffersFiltered(OfferFilter offerFilterBo,
                                OfferSortBy sortBy)
        Parameters:
        offerFilterBo - is the offers filter criteria
        sortBy - is the OfferSortBy attribute, which defines the sorting.
        Returns:
        the List with all OfferEtos that match the OfferFilter criteria.
